item.description:
This Brunch is specifically for our Diamond Members... So if you fit the criteria for Diamond status (Please Look at "About" page on the groups status bar to understand your status)

You loyal Madams get to sign up for our event this month at Mexican/ American in Manhattan, which will feature a a discounted prefix  brunch menu for $18, with endless free Margaritas  games, and much more! 
We just want to show you ladies that we appreciate you for being consistant, loyal and reliable members. So if you know for sure you can make it this Saturday please sign up!

All for you darling! Check it out! 

http://agaveny.com/main2.html

Thanks Lovelies!!

Lisa 
MWN Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: We will have a private room! Call my cell: 413-627-3484
item.why: We are celebrating our first brunch at our new Manhattan location Agave!! We finally found a place for al you Manhattan ladies, so let's meet up eat brunch, and drink our all day free Margaritas!!
item.name: “Le Madame Brunch,” at Agave MANHATTAN!! For The Diamond Madame!!
